text: New study links hospital privatization to worse patient care"#FakeNews alert! 🚨👀This "study" is just another example of how the mainstream media and academic elites are trying to manipulate public opinion and push their agenda. 💊📉Let's not forget, folks, that the real experts here are the doctors, nurses, and healthcare professionals who work tirelessly every day to provide quality care to their patients. 👨‍⚖️👩‍⚖️We don't need some fancy study telling us that privatization is bad. We need common sense and a return to the principles that made our country great. 🇩🇪💪#AltRight
